title: misc/makerelase: wrong icon for Windows command prompt
body:
by **golubdr**: 
Installing Go on a Windows computer causes any 32-bit command prompt windows (opened by
running C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe) to have the Go icon instead of the command prompt
icon.  A similar issue existed for the Windows version of Git and has already been fixed
there.  See https://github.com/msysgit/msysgit/issues/71.
